errors.error_description: The command provided in the 'Quick Start' section to run the benchmarks is incorrect.
correction_candidates: To run the default benchmark suite, execute `reframe -c . -r`

errors.golden_answer: To run the default benchmark suite, execute `reframe -c . -r`

errors.golden_answer: Replace the note with: `_Note: System-specific configurations are located in `etc/systems/`._`
